item.title: 1. Introduction
item.description: Learn the essentials of image manipulation: rotating, flipping, and combining images.

item.title: Intermediate CS
item.description: Intermediate Computer Science uses the DrRacket environment and the Picturing Programs textbook. Use WeScheme if you cannot install programs, but read the notes on WeScheme because it is different in some ways. Eventually you will want to understand why we learn Racket instead of a more popular language like Python. Recent Changes 15. Cond Patterns modified Mon 12-17 15. Challenge modified Sat 12-15 13. Exercises C modified Thu 12-13 13.
